title: Optimal Formula 1 Lap Sequence Identification
text:
Optimal Formula 1 Lap Sequence Identification

Leveraged the FastF1 API to extract telemetry data and applied Kohonen Maps (SOM), improving lap consistency by 13%.

Utilized distributed GPU clusters to process telemetry, enhancing analysis speed and model performance.

Clustered laps on a 2D Self-Organizing Map grid to visualize top-performing laps and key strategy points.

Applied Apriori and FP-Growth to identify performance-driving factors, achieving a 2-second lap time reduction.

title: Spotify Playlist Recommendation Optimization
text:
Spotify Playlist Recommendation Optimization

Analyzed 1M+ playlists to determine optimal length, genre, and sequencing, boosting listener retention through statistical testing (Mann-Whitney U, Kruskal-Wallis).
Increased engagement by segmenting user preferences across 10+ demographics and personalizing recommendations, validated with Chi-Square and Wilcoxon tests.
Applied Mann-Whitney U and Kruskal-Wallis tests to optimize playlist structure, reducing skip rates and enhancing content flow.

Cryptographic Neural Nets on Homomorphically Encrypted Data







No matching items

title: Cryptographic Neural Nets on Homomorphically Encrypted Data
text:
ðŸ”— View Publication


Project Summary

Cryptographic Neural Nets on Homomorphically Encrypted Data

Developed machine learning models capable of training on encrypted data to enhance data privacy and security while still enabling advanced machine learning applications.
Experimented with different homomorphic encryption schemes such as Brakerski-Gentry-Vaikuntanathan (BGV) and Cheon-Kim-Kim-Song (CKKS) to encrypt images. Utilized Microsoftâ€™s SEAL library to implement BGV and CKKS schemes.
Proposed an alternative way of achieving homomorphic data encryption by using autoencoders. Classified encrypted data using a custom CNN and achieved 70% accuracy on the CIFAR-10 dataset.

title: Projects
text:
Optimal Formula 1 Lap Sequence Identification


In this project I use FastF1, SOM, and association mining to optimize formula 1 lap strategies and improve lap time by 2 seconds.













Spotify Playlist Recommendation Optimization


In this project I used statistical testing and user segmentation to optimize playlist structure and boost listener retention across 1M+ playlists.













Wafer Map Failure Pattern Detection


In this project identified wafer defect/failure pattern type using machine learning.







No matching items

title: Wafer Map Failure Pattern Detection
text:
Wafer Map Failure Pattern Detection

Engineered 40+ spatial features (density histograms, localized geometric descriptors), improving pattern separability by 25%.
Incorporated semi-supervised learning with SHAP and t-SNE for interpretable anomaly detection under 70% label scarcity.
Leveraged stacked meta-models combining SVM and LightGBM, achieving 92% classification accuracy across five major wafer map failure patterns.

title: Nishant Hegde
text:
LinkedIn
  
  
    
     Github
  
  
    
     Email
  
  
     ðŸ†” ORCID
  

  
  
Hello, I am Nishant.
A Data Science graduate student with 4+ years as a software engineer specializing in NVMe SSD firmware development, 6 months of experience as an ML intern building scalable AI solutions, and 1.5 years of research in computer vision. Strong foundation in the semiconductor and embedded systems industry and expertise in data-driven problem-solving. I am actively seeking a Summer 2025 internship in Data Science or Machine Learning to apply my technical skills and research experience in impactful projects.



Software Engineer, Toshiba Software India (KIOXIA America Inc) â€” India (Aug 2020 â€“ May 2024)

Developed data-driven C++ modules to validate the behavior of the NVMe management endpoint and NVMe controller management over interfaces such as SMBus and I2C for NVMe BiCS data-centric SSDs, reducing operational latency by 31%.
Performed validation, regression testing, stress testing, and failure analysis with Java, improving firmware stability by 15%.
Orchestrated the deployment of high-quality firmware validation modules by using Scrum and Agile methodologies.
Led the automation of testing and validation processes using Jenkins, improving consistency and reducing manual effort by 20%.
Spearheaded cross-functional team collaboration using Confluence and JIRA, boosting workflow efficiency by 33% and shortening development cycles.

Machine Learning Intern, Multicoreware â€” [India] (Jan 2020 â€“ Jun 2020)

Engineered an end-to-end pedestrian tracking pipeline using YOLOv3, DeepSort, and AlignedReID, achieving 90% accuracy.
Developed custom filters like last seen area and low confidence tracker, reducing tracking errors by 23% for 1,000+ individuals.
Implemented analytics tools to track customer behavior, increasing shopping duration and optimizing crowd management.
Collaborated with data scientists and engineers using JIRA to refine tracking algorithms and optimize system performance.
Delivered a scalable, production-ready solution deployed in local malls to enhance customer tracking and crowd management.
